overview:
Chuck is Vice President, Marketing for RMG Networks where he is responsible for driving the company’s marketing strategy. As a member of the executive team, he plays a key role in shaping the company’s overall strategy and implementing it in the marketplace. He brings a wealth of experience working in global marketing and advertising organizations over the past 15 years. Prior to RMG, he was Director of Marketing for specialty retailer, Tween Brands, where he led brand management and partnerships efforts for their Limited Too and Justice brands. Chuck has served in account management roles with McCann-Erickson, Lowe, Lintas & Partners and Foote, Cone & Belding where he led international advertising assignments for Microsoft, Sun Microsystems and Kawasaki Motors. He currently sits on the Advisory Board of the Digital Signage Expo as a member of the Out-of-Home Network Council.

Mr. Strottman earned an M.B.A. from the Boston College Carroll Graduate School of Management and a B.A. in Advertising from Southern Methodist University.
